professional_summary: Senior Data Scientist with 8+ years developing machine learning solutions for healthcare and biotech. Expert in predictive modeling, deep learning, and clinical data analysis. Led teams delivering FDA-validated algorithms that improved diagnostic accuracy by 35% and reduced false positives by 42%. Strong track record translating complex research into production systems serving 10M+ patients.

experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
highlights: Developed deep learning model for early cancer detection from medical imaging, achieving 94% sensitivity and 89% specificity on 500K patient dataset
Built end-to-end MLOps pipeline using Kubernetes and MLflow, reducing model deployment time from 2 weeks to 3 days
Led cross-functional team of 6 engineers and clinicians to deliver FDA 510(k) cleared diagnostic algorithm
Implemented automated data quality monitoring system that reduced data errors by 67% and saved $1.2M annually
Mentored 4 junior data scientists and established team-wide best practices for reproducible research

experience.title: Data Scientist
highlights: Created predictive models for patient readmission risk using ensemble methods, reducing 30-day readmissions by 23%
Designed and implemented real-time anomaly detection system for ICU monitoring, processing 1M+ data points per minute
Developed NLP pipeline to extract insights from 2M clinical notes, improving diagnosis coding accuracy by 45%
Collaborated with product team to integrate ML models into clinical decision support tools used by 500+ physicians

experience.title: Research Data Analyst
highlights: Analyzed genomic and clinical data for precision medicine study with 10,000 participants
Built statistical models identifying novel biomarkers associated with treatment response (p<0.001)
Automated data processing workflows using Python and R, reducing analysis time by 60%
Co-authored 3 peer-reviewed publications in high-impact journals (Nature Medicine, JAMA)

education.thesis: Machine Learning Methods for Multi-Modal Clinical Data Integration

selected_projects.title: COVID-19 Risk Prediction Model
selected_projects.description: Open-source model predicting severe COVID-19 outcomes using clinical and demographic data
selected_projects.impact: Deployed in 15 hospitals, helped prioritize care for 50,000+ patients during surge periods

selected_projects.title: Medical Image Segmentation Library
selected_projects.description: PyTorch-based library for automated segmentation of medical images with state-of-the-art architectures
selected_projects.impact: 1,200+ GitHub stars, adopted by 3 major research institutions

publications: Mitchell S, et al. 'Deep Learning for Automated Detection of Diabetic Retinopathy.' Nature Medicine, 2020.
Mitchell S, et al. 'Multi-Modal Data Integration for Precision Oncology.' JAMA Network Open, 2019.
Mitchell S, et al. 'Federated Learning in Healthcare: A Systematic Review.' Journal of Biomedical Informatics, 2021.
leadership: Technical Lead - ML Community of Practice (2021-Present)
Mentor - Women in Data Science Program (2019-Present)
